QuestData.Title: Savage Saurolisks
QuestData.Description:
Please, help me! I'm trapped in dis box and I can't make it out alone!
I came here to collect eggs. I knew it was a bad idea, but I thought I could sneak around and grab de eggs before de saurolisks noticed.
I was wrong...
I hid underneath dis crate to avoid being eaten!
Can you clear out de saurolisks and tell me when it's safe to come out?
Please, don't leave me here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Scaleclaw Saurolisks in the Arid Basin.
